name: Pizza Rat: In the Calzone
description:
"Mama Mia! There's a rat!"

You're the rat.

And you want some pizza!

Eat up! Watch out for the pizza men! Nothing can stop a pizza fueled rat!

Credits:

Lead Programmer / Pizza Pickup Sprite - Tonnie Hovanec

Lead Artist / Assistant Programmer - Gary Carrasco

Music / Pickup Sprites - Jonathan Platon

BOH Documentation / Onion Sprite - Alejandro Arboleda

Sound Effects from https://mixkit.co/
